TutoExplainContent: Welcome into the Game of Life activity. Game of Life is a game to observe and explore how cells interacts and evolves generation after generation. Use one of provided pattern, a full random pattern or create your own and observe what happen
TutoCanvasContent: Every cell on the board interacts with its eight neighbours, which are the cells that are horizontally, vertically, or diagonally adjacent. At each generation, the following transitions occur:
TutoUnderContent: Any live cell with fewer than two live neighbours dies, as if by underpopulation
TutoNextContent: Any live cell with two or three live neighbours lives on to the next generation
TutoOverContent: Any live cell with more than three live neighbours dies, as if by overpopulation
TutoReproductionContent: Any dead cell with exactly three live neighbours becomes a live cell, as if by reproduction
TutoRunContent: Clique aqui para iniciar ou congelar o jogo
TutoRandomContent: Click here to generate a board fill with a random number of cells
TutoGliderContent: Click here to generate a board with a pattern called 'Glider' who move at each generation
TutoNoContent: Click here to generate a board filled with pattern called 'Blinker' who live forever
TutoClearContent: Click here to clear the board. You could then click on it to draw your own pattern
TutoCountContent: Aqui você pode visualizar qual a geração que você pertence atualmente
TutoSpeedContent: Clique aqui para fazer as gerações mais rápido ou mais lentas
TutoSizeContent: Clique aqui para mudar o tamanho do quadro
TutoDeadCellsContent: Clique aqui para ver as mortes nas trilhas das células
